body.name: USB LED Desk Lamp Clip On Reading Light, 3 Light Mode 10 Dimmable Brightness Levels Book Light for Dorm Bed Headboard, Adjustable Flexible Neck Clamp Light, Perfect for Working Studying
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 18. Order within 8 hrs 37 mins
features: 📖【3 Lighting Modes and 10 Brightness Levels】 Dimmable LED clamp desk lamp with 3 lighting modes: warm light (3000K), warm white light (4500K) and white light (6500K). There are 10 adjustable brightness options for each lighting mode. The built-in controller is easy to switch to the lighting mode to suit your various purposes, very suitable for Clip on bedside or headboard and reading in bed, night lighting, work, study, children's sleep, etc.

📖【Upgrade Eye Protection Light and Positioning in the Dark】 Desk lamp Perfect for college dorm room or home office. Made of 18 high-quality LEDs, the LED reading light doesn't flicker, dazzle, have ultraviolet rays, and dosen't have frequent radiation. It can protect eyesight and reduce eye fatigue caused by long-term reading. The weak blue light on the switch button allows you to find the switch in the dark, this weak light produces almost no energy consumption.

📖【Flexible Arm and Firm Clip】 The 15-inch gooseneck arm can be bent into any shape to adjust the lighting direction, and can be adjusted to any angle more than 30,000 times. The metal clip with non-slip pad can hold any surface firmly, and can be easily clipped on tables, desks, bedside tables, shelves, chairs, benches and more. The non-slip mat prevents scratches on furniture. If the arm is bent into an appropriate shape, the clamp can stand on the table by itself.

📖【USB Power Supply】Suitable for most devices that support USB ports, such as power banks, USB chargers, PCs and laptops, adapters (not included), etc. [Reminder: only used with 5V/2A adapter] 150cm cable, with excellent durability and long-distance power supply. Note: This USB desk lamp cannot be charged!

📖【Wide range of application】 The USB multi-function lamp is very suitable for bedside reading lamps, study lamps, table lamps, bedside lamps, camping lamps, computer lighting, baby care, etc. Choosing KNAMKY professional LED clip lamp is to choose high-quality and low-cost lighting life. The clip lamp can be fixed on the bedside table, desk, shelf, craft table, drawing board, work area, etc., to bring a better experience to your lighting life .

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At KNAMKY, we are committed to providing higher quality products, aiming to provide a better lighting life. This adjustable USB clip light has 3 built-in color temperatures: warm light (3000K), warm white light (4500K) and white light (6500K). Each lighting mode has 10 brightness levels. Three light settings let you choose according to your surroundings, and the intensity setting can easily meet all your requirements. Provide soft and uniform light, no flicker, no glare, dedicated to reading, painting, study, work, baby care, small-scale work scenes at night, as a bedside reading lamp is an ideal choice.

3 light modes, dimmable You can choose from 3 lighting modes: warm light, natural light and white light. 10 brightness levels for you to adjust the dimmer or brighter. Powerful clip frame The sturdy metal clip can be opened up to 2 inches and can be easily clipped on a table, table or bedside. The foam cushion design can provide you with scratch-free clamping force and protect your furniture. 360° flexible arm The 360° flexible gooseneck allows you to easily adjust the light to the perfect angle according to your needs. USB power supply It is suitable for most devices that support USB ports, such as power banks, USB chargers, AC adapters, PCs and laptops, and its output is 5V2A (not including adapters).

Three placement methods Clipped to the edge of the table Using strong clips, you can clip the ring light to the edge of a table, headboard or bookshelf. Standing on the table The table lamp can also stand on the fixture by itself by bending the arm into an appropriate shape. Hanging on the wall The bottom of the clip is designed with a round hole, and the support can make it easy to hang on the wall.

Packing list: 1 * Clip-on lamp 1 *User Manual (Not including AC adapter) Note: The LED reading light can be used with most devices that support USB ports and output 1~2A (not included). When not in use, disconnect the USB connection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Reading and Work Companion That Shines Bright
reviews.reviewText: As a bookworm and a work-from-home warrior, I've always been on the quest for the perfect desk lamp. One that would bathe my workspace in warm, cozy light without the hassle of complicated setups or eye-straining glare. After years of searching high and low, I finally found my illumination soulmate in the KNAMKY USB LED Desk Lamp Clip On Reading Light.Right out of the box, I was smitten with the KNAMKY's sleek, modern look. Its sturdy metal frame and flexible gooseneck neck exuded an air of quality and craftsmanship that made me eager to get it up and running. And let me tell you, setting up this lamp was a breeze. I had it clamped onto my desk and plugged in in under a minute.But the real magic happened when I turned it on. The KNAMKY boasts three distinct lighting modes – warm light for those cozy reading sessions, warm white light for focused work, and cool white light for those midday tasks that require extra clarity. And with 10 adjustable brightness levels, I could fine-tune the illumination to my exact liking, ensuring my eyes never got tired or strained.Speaking of brightness, let's talk about the sheer brilliance of this lamp. The KNAMKY's LEDs emit a soft, uniform light that's free from flickering or glare – a dream for both my eyes and my productivity. Whether I'm immersed in a captivating novel or crunching through spreadsheets, the KNAMKY always provides the perfect level of illumination.But the KNAMKY's brilliance extends beyond its lighting capabilities. Its flexible gooseneck neck allows me to bend and twist the lamp into any position I desire, ensuring that the light is always directed where I need it. And the sturdy clamp grips my desk like a vice, so there's no need to worry about the lamp wobbling or tipping over when I get a little too enthusiastic about my work or reading.In conclusion, the KNAMKY USB LED Desk Lamp Clip On Reading Light is more than just a desk lamp; it's an essential tool that has transformed my reading and work experience. Its ease of use, exceptional brightness, and versatile design make it an absolute must-have for anyone who wants to illuminate their workspace in style and comfort. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone seeking a desk lamp that will exceed their expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's small but perfect. Lights up my whole smallish room from one corner on the brightest setting so I have to keep it at the dimmest but that means it doubles as a night light for bathroom trips. The clap also works great and is very sturdy. The power botton glows so it's easy to turn on at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Light has different settings.Dim to bright. On low It's still pretty bright but good for evening reading. The warm/gold tint makes night time reading much better. The ckamp is very strong and it has a good longer cord. It's pretty fkexable but stays where you put it. It doesnt fall over. Very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bright light when you need it
reviews.reviewText: I bought this lamp to use in the bathroom so my husband could see the writing on his prescription bottles- the light is bright and works great. Like the flexible neck so you can bend it whatever direction you need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plenty bright! Smaller diameter than expected, so a sharp shadow is cast
reviews.reviewText: I might buy another to soften the shadow. I bought this as a work light over my desk where I occasionally work with electronics, in a very small area of about 1ft x 1ft (yes, I do have a well-lit an much larger workbench with wires and cables all over it). It is plenty bright enough, but when I am probing, or attaching a grabber to a wire or terminal the sharp shadow could be an issue. If it is, I will probably get another one. I only need the cool white (not the super cool blue light, or the yellow light) mode. If you're reading printed material though, that yellower mode might be best.The light source is smaller diameter than I expected. It's about 4.5cm across (smaller than 2 inches). So, it isn't too different from a clamp-on flashlight as far as the beam it casts. Since the LEDs are close to the surface, it's pretty wide-angle. It produces a little heat, and is noticeably warm at the top of the bell-shaped hood, but not hot. The clamp is sturdy, and applies plenty of pressure to keep it from moving around when adjusted. And the gooseneck is about 18 inches long, and surprisingly stiff, so it stays put.I might buy another and have no hesitation about recommending this product,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good night for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Had one of these for several years, and it has held up well. The on-off switch is almost worn out, so it was time for anyone a new one. I keep it plugged into USB charger most of the time. But when the lights go out, I use it with a portable charger for extra light. It does the trick. The cool, white and warm white settings are useful, but I blend the two together and turn the brightness level down and it’s very pleasing to do tasks by. I use it a lot when I’m on my tablet at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great item to have. I clip it on my laptop to work in a dimly lit room. The ability to adjust the brightness is very useful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Everything was made of metal, the dimmable feature worked perfectly! The clasp is sturdy and the neck holds it's shape very well!! The sunlight feature makes a subtle noise but it goes away if dimmed a little. Insanely good product for the price! And it got warm, but never hot :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good and the different settings for brightness and light colours are very useful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A great light. Very bright and easy to install, would fit easily on both a padded ,wooden or metal headboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a good light and works well on my dressing table for when I am doing Make up or hair. Nice and small so its not in the way but gives out plenty of light to do what I need. Happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great light, I have used it on multiple surfaces, clamped to my desk, clamped to the back of my chair, the clamp is very strong and the body very flexible but stays where you put it. There are a range of light type, like white, yellow and various brightness settings all on the handy little controller built into the flex. I found the price point reasonable, didn't go for the cheapest or most expensive, it does everything I want it to and was very easy to unbox and use!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lamp is very well done, strong and stylish. You could change light brightness and light temperature/color what is amazing as I prefer stronger white light for reading and not as intensive and more warm color for lightening room on evening time.Originally I've planned to use it in my camper van but is so cool that it would be my bedside light in my bedroom and if i need i take it with me to use in my van.I'm very delighted this product ***** stars minimum!
